abilities.name: Wolf Pack
abilities.short_description: When this champion is deployed from the runedock, 2 Timber Wolves champions with no upgrades are summoned adjacent to it.
abilities.long_description: When this champion is deployed from the runedock, 2 Timber Wolves champions with no upgrades are summoned adjacent to it.

abilities.name: Wolf Rider
abilities.short_description: When this unit is destroyed, no nora globe is dropped and an Icefisher with no upgrades is spawned in the location this unit occupied.
abilities.long_description: When this unit is destroyed, no nora globe is dropped and an Icefisher with no upgrades is spawned in the location this unit occupied.

abilities.name: Wooden Scales
abilities.short_description: When a player successfully casts a spell, each of that player's champions gets -1 DEF and the opponent's champions gets +1 DEF for 6 turns.
abilities.long_description: When a player successfully casts a spell, each of that player's champions gets -1 DEF and the opponent's champions gets +1 DEF for 6 turns.

abilities.name: Worm Lord
abilities.short_description: This champion has <ability value=2526>Necrosis</ability>.  When a real enemy champion is destroyed by a champion with Race: Worm or Necrosis within 5 spaces, your shrine's <mechanic value=deployment_zone>Deployment Zone</mechanic> expands by 1.
abilities.long_description: This champion has <ability value=2526>Necrosis</ability>.  When a real enemy champion is destroyed by a champion with Race: Worm or Necrosis within 5 spaces, your shrine's <mechanic value=deployment_zone>Deployment Zone</mechanic> expands by 1.

abilities.name: Worship: Lich
abilities.short_description: This champion loses 6 HP and gains <mechanic value=immobile>Immobile</mechanic> for 2 turns, and friendly Liches gain <ability value=117>Regeneration 3</ability> until this champion moves.
abilities.long_description: This champion loses 6 HP and gains <mechanic value=immobile>Immobile</mechanic> for 2 turns, and friendly Liches gain <ability value=117>Regeneration 3</ability> until this champion moves.

abilities.name: Worthwhile
abilities.short_description: When this champion dies, ten runes are revealed.
abilities.long_description: When this champion dies, ten runes are revealed.

abilities.name: Zeal: Damage
abilities.short_description: When this champion makes a successful basic attack, it gains +2 DMG for 5 turns.
abilities.long_description: When this champion makes a successful basic attack, it gains +2 DMG for 5 turns.

abilities.name: Zeal: Defense
abilities.short_description: When this champion makes a successful basic attack, it gains +2 DEF for 5 turns.
abilities.long_description: When this champion makes a successful basic attack, it gains +2 DEF for 5 turns.

abilities.name: Zeal: Speed
abilities.short_description: When this champion makes a successful basic attack, it gains +1 SPD for 5 turns.
abilities.long_description: When this champion makes a successful basic attack, it gains +1 SPD for 5 turns.

abilities.name: Zealot: Moga
abilities.short_description: This unit has +1 DMG for every friendly Moga.
abilities.long_description: This unit has +1 DMG for every friendly Moga.

abilities.name: Zealot: Skeezick
abilities.short_description: This unit has +1 DMG for every friendly Skeezick.
abilities.long_description: This unit has +1 DMG for every friendly Skeezick.

abilities.name: Zealot: Voil
abilities.short_description: This unit has +1 DMG for every friendly Voil or Bat.
abilities.long_description: This unit has +1 DMG for every friendly Voil or Bat.

abilities.name: Zephyr Shield
abilities.short_description: When this champion moves 4 spaces in a single turn, the next successful attack in 4 turns against it misses.  This effect stacks up to 3 times.
abilities.long_description: When this champion moves 4 spaces in a single turn, the next successful attack in 4 turns against it misses.  This effect stacks up to 3 times.

abilities.name: Zombie Apocalypse
abilities.short_description: This champion has <ability value=43>Immunity: Disease</ability>.  While you control at least 5 Zombies, this unit gains <ability value=2147>Swarm: Festering Corpse</ability>.
abilities.long_description: This champion has <ability value=43>Immunity: Disease</ability>.  While you control at least 5 Zombies, this unit gains <ability value=2147>Swarm: Festering Corpse</ability>.

abilities.name: Zombie Herder
abilities.short_description: Friendly Zombies within 5 spaces gain 3 AP and <ability value=396>Charge 3</ability> for 1 turn.  If the champion already has Charge, it gains <ability value=2092>Crushing Charge</ability> instead.
abilities.long_description: Friendly Zombies within 5 spaces gain 3 AP and <ability value=396>Charge 3</ability> for 1 turn.  If the champion already has Charge, it gains <ability value=2092>Crushing Charge</ability> instead.

abilities.name: Zombie Plague
abilities.short_description: This champion has <ability value=43>Immunity: Disease</ability>. When this champion successfully damages a non-Undead champion with a basic attack, that champion becomes Plagued for 6 turns. When a Plagued champion is destroyed, a Festering Corpse is summoned in its place, under your control.
abilities.long_description: This champion has <ability value=43>Immunity: Disease</ability>. When this champion successfully damages a non-Undead champion with a basic attack, that champion becomes Plagued for 6 turns. When a Plagued champion is destroyed, a Festering Corpse is summoned in its place, under your control.
